subject: Re: [junit] Embedding the TestRunner GUI into an applet?
msgSnippet: ... I don t know of such a thing. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods
messageBody:
jason r tibbetts wrote:
> I'm planning to write a simple applet that will pop open a JFrame that
> contains the JUnit Swing UI. I think that junit.swingui.TestRunner looks
> like the logical place to get ideas from, but is there anything more
> ready-made, such as a JFrame implementation that hooks up all the
> relevant widgets?

I don't know of such a thing.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
